summary: Four Children Orphaned and Became StormForce, they are out for Blood! Stormcloaks Forever!
descriptionHtml:
Four children, Skittles, Adela, KenJinGo, and Ren, StormForce Warriors! They fight with heart! They may get scared and they may get hurt but they keep fighting until the enemy has been destroyed! They fight well in the Civil war I\'ve never had any problems..


They are based in Windhelm, Palace of the Kings but, after starting the Mod they should find you in your travels...If not travel to Windhelm, Palace of the Kings..

This MOD was made for the stormcloak faction side of the war so if you like the Imperials you won\'t like this Mod...
...PLEASE IF YOU DON\'T LIKE THE MOD SIMPLY DON\'T DOWNLOAD IT...I DON\'T NEED THE CRAP COMMENTS FROM THE HATERS...

I made this Mod for me a while back and I thought I would share it. I have used it for some time now and I haven\'t had any problems at all..Please let me know of any Bugs\'\'


Required Mods:  Latest Version of Skyrim and Update
To Install: Drop main file into your \"Data\" File of your Skyrim directory...And don\'t forget to activate Mod!
author: IceSpiders
